p: The chemical compositions of C. indicum and C. morifolium essential oils have been previously studied. Camphor, borneol, camphene, Î±-pinene, p-cymene and 1,8 cineole are the major constituents of the oils [ 27, 28]. In spite of the significant biological importance of these plants, their essential oils were not fully investigated, only the antimicrobial activity had been studied [ 28].
